sentences.en: a bucking bronco in the rodeo
sentences.cn: 牛仔竞技表演中一匹弓背跳跃的野马

sentences.en: And over the years, modders have introduced several innovations that have grown into entire product categories—like mountain bikes, heart-lung machines, and rodeo kayaks.
sentences.cn: 这些年来，游戏制作者们已经引进了一些进入整个生产线的创新产品——想山地车、心肺呼吸器、竞技皮划艇.

sentences.en: And what are they expecting there on Rodeo Drive.
sentences.cn: 那么他们在罗迪欧大道上期待什么?

sentences.en: Chubby, a smallish, charcoal? gray horse, had been a tri state rodeo champion in roping and bulldogging.
sentences.cn: 查比 个头 不大,颜色碳灰, 曾经是三州马术竞技会上套绳和摔倒小公牛的双项冠军.它健壮,悟性好,反应快, 精力充沛,我们全家人都喜欢它.

sentences.en: Elsewhere , Delinda meets and falls for Cody Barnes, a handsome Rodeo champion.
sentences.cn: 莲娜亦遇到心仪对象, 与一英俊马术冠军堕入爱河.

sentences.en: Give'em a hand, folks, our very own rodeo clowns!
sentences.cn: 伙计, 帮他个忙我们可爱的小丑竞技员们!

sentences.en: I feel like I just got back from the rodeo.
sentences.cn: 我觉得像刚刚参加完牛仔竞技回来.

sentences.en: My brother is a rodeo rider.
sentences.cn: 我哥哥是个马技表演者.

sentences.en: Riding bulls is always an exciting event at a rodeo.
sentences.cn: 骑公牛总是放牧人竞技会上激动人心的表演.

sentences.en: TARDEC had its own system on display at the rodeo's convoy event.
sentences.cn: TARDEC曾 在罗德奥的车队事件及其在显示自己的系统.

sentences.en: The 40 - year - old rodeo cowboy decided to hang up his spurs and retire.
sentences.cn: 这名年届不惑的牛仔决定高挂马刺靴,过退休生活.

sentences.en: The guys at the rodeo were FBI too, right ?
sentences.cn: 在竞技场的那些家伙也是联邦调查局的, 是 吗 ?

sentences.en: The spurs cause blunt trauma to the shoulders which again never have time to heal properly before the horse is ridden and spurred in another rodeo.
sentences.cn: 马刺会造成肩膀的钝伤，这些伤从来都没有等到痊愈就会被在另一场竞技秀中再次被骑和刺。

sentences.en: They were bringing up the horses at the rodeo.

sentences.cn: 过来,这不是竞技会, 牛仔!

sentences.en: Wearing stars and stripes, a cowboy watches rodeo events from the chutes.
sentences.cn: 一位身着星条旗服装的牛仔在斜槽后观看着骑术表演.

sentences.en: Welcome to English in a minute. This idiom makes it sound like you are at a rodeo.
sentences.cn: 欢迎来到一分钟英语。这个表达听起来我们在竞技比赛中。

sentences.en: When you Rodeo you get a real taste of life in the Midwest.
sentences.cn: 如果您有机会参加竞技会,您就可以体验到真正的中西部生活.

trans.tran_cn: 竞技表演，竞技者，（集中牛马的）圈地，（为打烙印的）驱集牛马，牧人马术表演
trans.tran_en: a type of entertainment in which  cowboy s  ride wild horses, catch cattle with ropes, and ride in races
